blogItems.title: Rocky Journey - FPGAs and Verilog

blogItems.title: Personal Website - This Time with React
blogItems.subtitle: There is no programming pill. It takes time. This is the story how this website is made. I also talk about how I taught myself HTML, CSS, JS and React.

blogItems.title: React Icons - Import Only the Required Favicons

blogItems.subtitle: There is an app for your Windows Laptop that allows you to change between DHCP and static IP easily
